level.heading: Determination of general policy; supervision of expenditures.
level.text: The Board shall determine all questions of general policy relating to public recreation in and for the District of Columbia, and shall supervise and direct expenditure of all appropriations and/or other funds made available to the Board.

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: Recreation Board abolished: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 10- 201.
